comments:
I'm using 3.1 M5a.

The target platform for my workspace is 2.1.3.

I have a subclass of junit.framework.TestCase. When I try to run this test 
as "Junit plugin test", I get an exception in the 
log : "IllegalArgumentException: Application not found: 
org.eclipse.pde.junit.runtime.legacyCoretestapplication. at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:856)"
I forgot to mention, but the same test is correctly run under 3.1 M4.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 86301 ***
